page.title: 01WICKERSLEY AND HERRINGTHORPE
page.content: {WICKERSLEY AND HERRINGTHORPE The area is mostly residential.There are some playing fields and there are some open spaces.People who live in the area usually go to work in Rotherham or Sheffield.One main road slices the area in half.It is a dual carriageway.It starts at the M18 motorway at Hellaby and goes right through Wickersley to the Rotherway near Brinsworth.It is called Bawtry Road.Most of the houses are privately owned but there is a large council estate at Herringthorpe.We have a leisure centre it has a swimming pool,squash courts and a roller skating rink.It is 33p for one junior swimmer.There is a private golf course called Sitwell Park.We have regular bus services to Rotherham Doncaster and Sheffield.Children can travel to Sheffield for 4p and Rotherham for 2p.
